full_summary:
**Door Assembly Tender Notice**
================================

**Title**: Door Assembly
**Reference Number**: cb-371-54164486
**Solicitation Number**: W8482-241928/A

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Method of Procurement**: Competitive - Traditional
**Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
**Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Overview**
------------

The Department of National Defence, Canada, invites bids for the supply of door assemblies for use at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia, and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia. The required door assemblies are detailed below.

**Specifications**
----------------

1. Item 1: Door Assembly
	* Part Number: 593-6961301 ASSY97
	* NSN: 01-453-4822
	* Quantity: 2
	* Unit of Issue: Assembly
	* Delivery Location: CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
2. Item 2: Door Assembly
	* Part Number: 593-6961301 ASSY97
	* NSN: 01-453-4822
	* Quantity: 5
	* Unit of Issue: Assembly
	* Delivery Location: CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

**Submission Requirements**
---------------------------

* Interested suppliers must submit prices in Canadian dollars.
* Bidders proposing an Equivalent or Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model, and/or Part Number and the NCAGE.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Important Dates**
------------------

* Tender Closing Date: January 11, 2024, 14:00:00 (EST)
* Expected Contract Start Date: January 15, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: January 15, 2025

**Contact Information**
----------------------

* Name: Katharine Barker
* Email: [Katharine.Barker2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Katharine.Barker2@forces.gc.ca)
* Telephone: (555) 555-5555
* Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

**Attachments**
---------------

The tender notice and RFP document are available for download at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27401/new-rfp-w8482-241928-eng.pdf](https://canad
